meanings.sent1: The exterminator is disinfesting the house to get rid of the pests.

meanings.sent3: The mice were so surprised by the disinfesting process that they decided to find a new home.

meanings.definition: To remove or eliminate pests or vermin from a place
meanings.sent1: She is disinfesting the kitchen to ensure there are no pests left.
meanings.sent2: The team will be disinfesting the entire building to make it pest-free.
meanings.sent3: The disinfesting of the garden turned into a fun game of hide and seek with the pests.
meanings.sent4: By disinfesting the basement, we are reclaiming our space from unwanted visitors.
meanings.sent5: The process of disinfesting the warehouse was like a battle against an invisible enemy.
